=== Linux ===

+
[[Image:Ubuntu 8.04.png|220px|thumb|right|[[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]], a popular [[Linux distribution]], one of many available]]
As there are a large number of [[Linux distribution]]s, there are many organizations involved in [[Linux]] advocacy, including companies directly involved in the development of distributions as well as purely advocacy-based groups, such as [[SEUL]]. Promotion takes on a wide variety of forms from [[plush toy]]s to [[t-shirt]]s and [[poster]]s, and even to more unorthodox forms, such as body paints and video games.
As there are a large number of [[Linux distribution]]s, there are many organizations involved in [[Linux]] advocacy, including companies directly involved in the development of distributions as well as purely advocacy-based groups, such as [[SEUL]]. Promotion takes on a wide variety of forms from [[plush toy]]s to [[t-shirt]]s and [[poster]]s, and even to more unorthodox forms, such as body paints and video games.
